categoriesExplanation:
The workout titled "Feeling Rhythm 22 Cool-Down" and classified under 'Cool Down,standard,row' strongly suggests it is an Indoor Rowing workout. The description of 'cool down' combined with the activity of 'feeling the rhythm with your eyes closed' suggests a more relaxed state aimed at reducing heart rate and tension post-exercise.
